[[Image:Tolkien Calendar 1996.jpg: '''Tolkien Calendar 1996''' was published by Slaski Klub Fantasyki, Poland ([[Polish Tolkien Society]]). The calendar features illustrations by [[Ryszard Derdzinski]], [[Arkadiusz Jubala]], [[Helena Strolkowska]], [[Ma≈Çgorzata Pudlik]], [[Maciej Wygnanski]], and [[Aleksandra Jagielowica]]. Reckonings in standard dates, the [[Buckland]] calendar, new reckoning of [[Aragorn
thumb]]: King Elessar]], and the [[Calendar of Imladris]].
